title: Client Booking & Experience Assistant (Part-Time / Remote)
job_overview:
Hi, I’m Chef Matt.
I run a fast-growing personal chef brand, a culinary coaching platform, and a retail cookie concept. I'm looking for a proactive, highly organized assistant who can help me manage inbound leads, handle bookings, and ensure every client feels taken care of from first contact to follow-up.

What You'll Be Doing
Responding to inbound leads (email, form, or DM)

Calling warm leads, qualifying their needs, and explaining our services

Sending deposit invoices & confirming bookings
 
Emailing pre-event confirmations (menus, guest count, timing)

Handling basic scheduling tasks using my calendar system

Updating my CRM or booking tracker

Sending follow-up emails after events (for reviews or re-booking)

Who I'm Looking For
Excellent English & confident phone presence

Reliable, responsive, and organized

Not afraid to own the client experience (think concierge-style)

Experience with service-based businesses (hospitality a plus)

Strong email etiquette and communication skills

Ideally available during US business hours

Compensation
starting at $4-6 hour depending on experience

Commission or bonus available per booking

20-40 hours
Room to grow with the brand long-term


Include:

A short video or voice note introducing yourself

A quick paragraph explaining why you’d be a great fit

Your resume or link to your portfolio/profile

Your availability and expected hourly rate
